meta.description: Getting Things GNOME! (GTG) is a personal tasks and TODO-list items organizer for the GNOME desktop environment and inspired by the ''Getting Things Done'' (GTD) methodology.

license.fullName: GNU General Public License v3.0 only

meta.long_description:
GTG is designed with flexibility, adaptability, and ease of use in mind so it can be used as more than just GTD software.
      GTG is intended to help you track everything you need to do and need to know, from small tasks to large projects.
meta.name: gtg

meta.description: A personal tasks and TODO-list items organizer.
